title: Deceitful Remainers are fooling themselves if they think we can't see through their 'People's Vote' lies
text:
It is, I suppose, possible to conceive of a politician who believes that there should be a second Brexit referendum because they genuinely think it’s unclear what we should do now – and that the best way to decide is to ask the people.

It’s possible to conceive of such a person, yes. Because just about anything is possible in theory. But in reality, it would be a flight of pure fancy trying to come up with the name of any living, breathing, politician who actually thinks that.

Because one thing has become clear since the Prime Minister successfully negotiated his new withdrawal deal last Thursday – the last three years’ claims by Remainers that all they want is a sensible and workable form of...
description: It is, I suppose, possible to conceive of a politician who believes that there should be a second Brexit referendum because they genuinely think it’s unclear what we should do now – and that the best way to decide is to ask the people.
